# Inventory Interactions (Fabric)

[![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/status-beta-yellow)](https://img.shields.io/badge/status-beta-yellow)
[![Release](https://img.shields.io/badge/release-2.0.0-blue)](https://img.shields.io/badge/release-2.0.0-blue)
[![Minecraft](https://img.shields.io/badge/minecraft->=1.18.2-blue)](https://img.shields.io/badge/minecraft->=1.18.2-blue)
[![Loader](https://img.shields.io/badge/loader-Fabric-blue)](https://img.shields.io/badge/loader-Fabric-blue)

*formerly known as **Quick Repair***

A simple, configurable server-side mod that allows you to repair & craft items by right-clicking in the inventory

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/94454399/173060365-8f1a8a07-50b9-4435-9acb-8fac1ced4a61.png)

### Features

* fully configurable
* unit repairing
* item combining
* item naming
* shapeless crafting
* item smithing
* more comming soon... feel free to suggest!

If you find any issues, please let report it immediately and I will try to fix it ASAP

### Downloads
I will not be releasing future versions the mod on github. 

Instead, I have released it on Curseforge and Modrinth, click on the banners to get to the webpage.

[![Curseforge Downloads](https://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/620812.svg?badge_style=for_the_badge)](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/quick-repair-mod)
[![Modrinth Downloads](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=5da545&label=modrinth&prefix=downloads%20&query=downloads&url=https://api.modrinth.com/api/v1/mod/Uujh5wUc&style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/quick-repair)
